contents:
使用html與css編寫自己履歷 codepen
<div class="resume"> <div class="line1"> <div class="left"> <div class="name">1996.08.01<br>YING-TZU</div> <div class="introduce"> Work on XX company,<br>assist customer to use our system,provide consultancy service. </div> <div class="hopel1"> Want to be a <br>UI UX designer </div> </div><div class="middle"> <div class="trait">Trait #positive</div> <div class="time"> <div class="timecircle"> <div class="timestudy"></div> <div class="timegensin"></div> <div class="timehobby"></div> </div> <div class="timeline"> <div class="work">♦︎ work</div> <div class="study">♦︎ study</div> <div class="hobby">♦︎ hobby</div> <div class="gensin">♦︎ gensin</div> </div></div> </div><div class="right"> <div class="pic"> <img src="https://i.imgur.com/glwZdnK.jpg" alt="" height＝"250" width="180"> </div> </div> <div class="blank"></div> <div class="line2"> <div class="title"> <div class="dash">-</div> <div class="cube"></div> <div class="x">x</div> </div> <div class="wleft"> <div class="year">2022</div> <div class="dash2"></div> <div class="resume2">resume</div> <div class="skill">SKILL</div> <div class="marksk"></div> <div class="html"> <div class="htmlcube">HTML</div> <div class="htmlbar"> <div class="htmlbar1"></div><div class="htmlbar2"></div><div class="htmlbar3"></div><div class="htmlbar4"></div> </div> </div> <div class="css"> <div class="csscube">CSS</div> <div class="cssbar"> <div class="cssbar1"></div><div class="cssbar2"></div><div class="cssbar3"></div> </div> </div> <div class="js"> <div class="jscube">JS</div> <div class="jsbar"> <div class="jsbar1"></div><div class="jsbar2"></div><div class="jsbar3"></div> </div> </div> <div class="contactme">CONTACT&nbsp;ME</div> <div class="dash3"></div> <div class="mail"> <img src="https://i.imgur.com/IYctYw3.png" alt="mailpic" width=35px height=35px> <div class="mailad">xxx@gmail.com</div> </div> <div class="phone"> <img src="https://i.imgur.com/0AYYojj.png" alt="phonepic" width=35px height=35px> <div class="phoneno">09-1234-1234</div> </div> </div><div class="wright"> <div class="wtitle"> <div class="home">HOME</div> <div class="about">ABOUT</div> <div class="click"> <img src="https://i.imgur.com/OeCUP0c.png" alt="click" width=25px;> </div> <div class="work2">WORK</div> <div class="etc">ETC</div> </div> <div class="career">CAREER</div> <div class="career1"> <div class="timeline1"> <div class="now">NOW</div> <div class="past">PAST</div> </div> <div class="timetable"> <div class="arrow"></div> <div class="tline1"></div> <div class="tline2"></div> <div class="tline3"></div> <div class="tline4"></div> </div> <div class="ctime"> <div class="ct1"> x&nbsp;year&nbsp;x&nbsp;month </div> <div class="ct2"> x&nbsp;year&nbsp;x&nbsp;month </div> <div class="ct3"> x&nbsp;year&nbsp;x&nbsp;month </div> <div class="ct4"> x&nbsp;year&nbsp;x&nbsp;month </div> </div> <div class="cj"> <div class="cj1"> Position </div> <div class="cj2"> Position </div> <div class="cj3"> Position </div> <div class="cj4"> Position </div> </div> <div class="edu">EDUCATION</div> <div class="edu1"> <div class="edtime"> <div class="edb">xxxx.xx.xx-</div> <div class="edf">xxxx.xx.xx</div> </div> <div class="edschool"> USC&nbsp;TMA </div> </div> <div class="more"> <div class="moreb">more➜ </div> </div> </div> </div> </div> *{ /* border:solid 0.1px; */ vertical-align:top; /* display:relatve; */ font-family:Comic Sans MS; } .resume{ width:800px; height:250px; margin-left:auto; margin-right:auto; background-color:#FFFFFF; } .line1{ /* width:100%; */ /* height:400px; */ box-sizing:border-box; border-top:solid 5px; background-color:#FFFFFF; /* box-shadow:0px 15px 30px -5px rgba(0,0,0,0.7); */ } .name,.introduce,.hope,.trait,.time,.pic{ /* border:solid 2px; */ } .left,.middle,.right{ display:inline-block; box-sizing:border-box; margin:0px; } .left{ width:30%; border-left:solid 5px; } .middle{ width:30%; position:relative; } .right{ width:40%; border-right:solid 5px; } .name{ /* width:30%; */ height:60px; border-right:solid 5px; border-bottom:solid 5px; text-align:center; font-weight:900; font-size:20px; letter-spacing:5px; } .introduce{ /* width:30%; */ height:105px; border-right:solid 5px; border-bottom:solid 5px; padding-top:15px; padding-right:10px; padding-left:15px; font-size:15px; } .hopel1{ /* width:30%; */ height:60px; border-right:solid 5px; border-bottom:solid 5px; font-weight:200; font-size:20px; text-align:center; } .trait{ /* width:30%; */ height:45px; padding-top:15px; border-right:solid 5px; border-bottom:solid 5px; font-weight:200; font-size:25px; text-align:center; } .time{ /* width:30%; */ height:185px; border-right:solid 5px; border-bottom:solid 5px; } .timecircle,.timeline{ display:inline-block; } .timecircle{ height:110px; width:110px; border:solid 3px; border-radius:100px; background-color:rgb(6,6,6); margin-top:40px; margin-left:10px; position:relative; overflow: hidden; } .timestudy,.timehobby,.timegensin{ position:absolute; height:110px; width:110px; } .timestudy{ background:#636363; right:-55px; top:-55px; } .timegensin{ background:#c683AD; right:-55px; bottom:-55px; } .timehobby{ background:#3A7684; right:-78px; transform:rotate(45deg);	} .work,.study,.hobby,.gensin{ margin-top:10px; margin-left:15px; font-weight:900; letter-spacing:1px; } .work{ margin-top:30px; } .study{ color:#636363; } .hobby{ color:#3A7684; } .gensin{ color:#C683AD; } .pic{ /* width:40%; */ height:250px; border-bottom:solid 5px; padding-left:65px; background-color:#060606; } .blank{ height:20px; background-color:rgb(234,242,251,0.8); } .title{ border:solid 5px; border-bottom:solid 5px; display:relative; } .dash,.cube,.x{ display:inline-block; width:10px; font-weight:900; font-size:20px; box-sizing:border-box; } .dash{ margin-left:720px; margin-top:2px; margin-right:5px; } .cube{ border:solid 3px; height:15px; width:15px; margin-top:10px; margin-right:5px; } .x{ /* margin-top:1px; */ } line2{ box-sizing:border-box; height:300px; } .wleft,.wright{ display:inline-block; box-sizing:border-box; height:600px; } .wleft{ width:30%; border-left:solid 5px; border-bottom:solid 5px; background-color:rgba(99,99,99,0.1); } .wright{ width:70%; /* border-left:solid 5px; */ border-bottom:solid 5px; border-right:solid 5px; } .year{ letter-spacing:2px; width:55px; height:25px; border-radius:4px; background-color:#060606; color:#FFFFFF; padding:2px 0px 2px 10px; margin-left:20px; margin-top:10px; } .dash2{ margin-left:20px; margin-top:10px; border-radius:4px; width:15px; height:4px; background-color:#060606; } .resume2{ letter-spacing:2px; width:75px; height:25px; border-radius:4px; background-color:#060606; color:#FFFFFF; padding:2px 0px 2px 10px; margin-left:20px; margin-top:10px; } .skill{ letter-spacing:10px; width:110px; height:30px; border-radius:100px; background-color:rgba(198,131,173,0.4); color:#FFFFFF; padding:2px 0px 2px 10px; margin-left:15%; margin-top:20px; margin-bottom:20px; font-weight:900; font-size:20px; /* border:solid 1px rgba(198,131,173,0.1); */ text-align:center; } .htmlcube,.csscube,.jscube{ width:40px; height:40px; font-size:10px; background-color:#060606; color:#FFFFFF; border-radius:5px; text-align:center; line-height:40px; margin-left:10%; margin-top:10px; display:inline-block; } .htmlbar,.cssbar,.jsbar{ width:100px; height:15px; display:inline-block; border:solid 3px; margin-left:10%; margin-top:20px; border-radius:3px; } .htmlbar1,.htmlbar2,.htmlbar3{ display:inline-block; background-color:rgb(6,6,6); width:25px; height:15px; margin:0px; border-right:dashed rgb(99,99,99); box-sizing:border-box; } .htmlbar4{ display:inline-block; background-color:rgb(6,6,6); width:10px; height:15px; margin:0px; box-sizing:border-box; } .cssbar1,.cssbar2,.cssbar3{ display:inline-block; background-color:rgb(6,6,6); width:25px; height:15px; margin:0px; border-right:dashed rgb(99,99,99); box-sizing:border-box; } .jsbar1,.jsbar2,.jsbar3{ display:inline-block; background-color:rgb(6,6,6); width:25px; height:15px; margin:0px; border-right:dashed rgb(99,99,99); box-sizing:border-box; } .jsbar3{ background-color:rgba(99,99,99,0.01); border-right:dashed rgb(99,99,99); } .contactme{ letter-spacing:3px; width:205px; height:30px; border-radius:100px; background-color:rgba(198,131,173,0.4); color:#FFFFFF; padding:0px 0px 2px 10px; margin-left:5%; margin-top:20px; /* margin-bottom:40px; */ font-weight:900; font-size:20px;	text-align:center; } .dash3{ margin-left:20px; margin-top:10px; border-radius:4px; width:200px; height:4px; background-color:#060606;	} .mail,.phone{ margin-top:20px; margin-left:25px; } .mailad,.phoneno{ display:inline-block; margin-top:10px; margin-left:10px; letter-spacing:1px; } .home,.about,.click,.work2,.etc{ display:inline-block; margin-right:30px; margin-top:10px; font-size:25px; font-weight:900; letter-spacing:3px; } .about{ border-radius:100px; background-color:rgba(198,131,173,0.4); /* color:#FFFFFF; */ } .home{ margin-left:40px; } .click{ /* position:absolute; right:270px; top:345px; */ transform:rotate(-30deg); margin-left:-40px; margin-top:30px; } .career,.edu{ font-size:45px; font-weigth:900; color:rgba(99,99,99,0.4); letter-spacing:5px; margin-left:30px; margin-bottom:20px; } .edu{ margin-top:20px; margin-bottom:0px; } .timeline1{ width:60px;height:150px; display:inline-block; } .now,.past{ font-size:10px; letter-spacing:3px; margin-left:10px; } .now{ margin-bottom:110px; } .timetable{ display:inline-block; border-left:solid 4px; width:150px;height:150px; } .arrow{ width:10px; height:10px; border:solid 3px; border-right:none; border-bottom:none; transform:rotate(45deg); margin-left:-8px; } .tline1,.tline2,.tline3,.tline4{ width:140px;height:10px; border:solid 2px rgb(0,0,0); margin-top:15px; margin-bottom:5px; background-color:rgb(0,0,0); /* box-sizing:border-box; */ display:inline-block; } .tline2{ width:120px;height:10px; display:inline-block; } .tline3{ width:130px;height:10px; display:inline-block; } .tline4{ width:60px;height:10px;	display:inline-block; } .ctime,.cj{ display:inline-block; width:150px;height:150px; } .ct1,.ct2,.ct3,.ct4{ letter-spacing:2px; } .ct1{ margin-top:20px; } .ct2{ margin-top:13px; } .ct3{ margin-top:13px; } .ct4{ margin-top:13px; } .cj1,.cj2,.cj3,.cj4{ letter-spacing:2px; } .cj1{ margin-top:20px; } .cj2{ margin-top:13px; } .cj3{ margin-top:13px; } .cj4{ margin-top:13px; } .edtime,.edschool{ width:150px;height:100px; /* margin-left:10px; */ display:inline-block; font-size:20px; letter-spacing:2px; padding-top:40px; margin-left:10px; } .edtime{ line-height:35px; font-weight:900; padding:20px; padding-right:0px; margin-left:10px; } .edschool{ font-size:25px; } .more{ width:550px;height:60px; padding-right:0px; } .moreb{ width:80px; height:30px; text-align:center; letter-spacing:2px; boarder:solid 3px rgb(6,6,6); background-color:rgb(6,6,6); color:rgb(255,255,255); box-sizing:border-box; border-radius:5px; margin-top:30px; margin-left:450px; } body{ background-color:rgb(234,242,251,0.8); margin-top:50px; margin-bottom:50px; height:900px; }
title: yingtzu in nara

contents:
日本自由行 Day2奈良 一走出奈良車站，天空就開始飄雪，白雪皚皚真的好美～
🐾奈良公園 想體驗萬鹿風靡的人物 就來奈良吧！ 鹿餅在手，萬鹿我有 幸好鹿都很やさしいꉂꉂ ฅ(ˋ͈ 𐂮 ˊ͈ฅ
🐾東大寺 混入了國中生的校外參訪， 覺得超級無違和！ 大佛真的很壯觀， 覺得很敬畏，嘆為觀止！
🐾春日大社 飄著雪，跟著小鹿走在去往神社的路上，很夢幻很美！好喜歡～ 也在神社買了白鹿御神籤，抽中了大吉·͜·♡
title: yingtzu in nara

contents:
日本自由行 Day1大阪 第一次來日本🇯🇵
空靈乾淨的日本好き
距離上次出國已經是3年前！
啊 是久違的自由行!
跟彩魚和大阪地頭蛇-璇、耀哥出來玩！
不用看複雜的交通輕鬆( •̤ᴗ•̤ )♡
🐾通天閣
因為時間來不及，所以就沒有上去，遠看也很壯觀！
在商店街一邊吃著串串，討論通天閣看起來很像違建的大樓𖦹ࡇ𖦹
– 秘密：–
94比利肯神雕像也有上班接客時間，晚上回家時，祂就會是背對遊客。
[通天閣] [通天閣グルメ] [比利肯福神]
🐾大阪城🏯
我們很棒，走樓梯上頂樓，
裡面紀錄了豐臣秀吉的豐功偉業，觀光客的我，94要買大阪城的吊飾(•̀ᴗ•́)و ̑̑
[大阪城]
🐾HEP FIVE摩天輪🎡
晚餐吃好吃的牛肉！窗外就是美麗(耀哥恐懼)的摩天輪，
看璇把耀哥請上摩天輪，真的很有趣。
因為身邊沒有人怕高，第一次看到有人搭摩天輪全程閉眼睛，我超想笑但有忍住！
[hepfive] [hepfiveferriswheel]
🐾天然溫泉 浪花之湯
第一次體驗裸湯，跟璇坦誠相見，沒帶搓澡布，
差點就可以互相搓澡了？
走了一整天的路，最後來泡澡真的…好舒服啊！
還有跑完澡，一起shot nene 好幸福ჱ̒⸝⸝•̀֊•́⸝⸝)
short video
title: yingtzu in osaka
